Flatstudio - Lisbon 2016Exchange
of Social Activity

A social network for activity exchange got a new look by our team at Flatstudio.

Vkmix June 2016 Social simplicity.

About

VKmix is a service for a quick and free exchange of social activity in the social network like Vkontakte, Instagram, YouTube and Twitter. The whole service is based on the system of a real exchange between users.

Deliverables

Web UI/UX Design
Web Responsive
Creative Direction
Color Approach

Authors
Bohdan Kononets Facebook Telegram Linkedin Behance

Senior Interface & Graphic Designer and Founder of Flatstudio. A perfectionist with a lot of passion for details in web and mobile development, colors and pixel perfection. Bohdan gets inspiration from the scientific books and films.

Slava Kornilov Facebook Telegram Behance

Product designer and typography guru at Flatstudio. His interests and working skills are focusing on web and mobile interface design. Slava thoroughly studies and implements both Motion Design and Material Design.

Illusrtations
a path to individuality

They provide an emotional atmosphere, a character and visual representation of the whole service and turn an average website into something really unique.

Tasks Page
simple activity exchange

The Tasks page is like your VKmix homepage. It shows the tasks that you need to action, their state, provides the groups to follow and shortcuts to work with all the lists.

Blog Page
simple and clear

There is a company blog to read and get news. It is designed to be simple and clear to enjoy every article.

New version
New version
New version

Statistics Page
informative and clear

Get all the statistics of your activity and tasks performance on one page with detailed information of each item.

New version

Create Page
simple and clear

Create new tasks for every social network with points you can earn performing the tasks created by other users.

New version
New version

Interface
modern and attractive

With the modern and attractive interface, you will never want to leave any page. It attracts you to perform the tasks, to use the services, to see the statistics and enjoy reading the blog.
